sources.title: Strangers In The Night (1944)
sources.description: In this Gothic tale, a returning WW2 vet goes looking for a small-town girl whom he knows only from letters. Its the pretext for an off-beat treatment of sexual frustration morphing into a dangerous delusion, and eventually murder. Watch on RetroFlix.org:  https://retroflix.org/strangers-in-the-night-1944/

sources.title: Strangers In The Night (1944) Dir: Anthony Mann Featuring Virginia Grey - Film Noir
sources.description: Strangers in the Nigh t is a 1944 American film noir mystery film directed by Anthony Mann and starring William Terry, Virginia Grey and Helene Thimig. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strangers_in_the_Night_(film) Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.

metadata.Plot: A lonely, mentally unbalanced woman invents a fictitious daughter and has the "daughter" write to a Marine stationed in the South Pacific. When the soldier returns back to the States, he goes to look up his pen pal, and is told by the "mother" that the daughter has moved away. An acquaintance of the women tells the soldier the truth, and in a rage the "mother" kills her. In order to cover up that crime, she realizes she must kill the soldier, too.
metadata.Writer: Philip MacDonald, Bryant Ford, Paul Gangelin
metadata.Actors: William Terry, Virginia Grey, Helene Thimig
